name: Путешествие паладина
description:
This is a story about a paladin that left his home monastery for the first time to go on quest. The quest appeared harder that paladin throught: she is haunted by demons now, and the only people who coul help her - ancient rivals of paladins, the Duids.
Dramatic story combining classic JRPG feateures with CRPG one:
  • Choose gender, appearence, background and skills on your hero.
  • Gather your party: six different characters who could join your quest.
  • Weave your fate: non-linear story with different outcomes.
  • Explore the world: find secret places and additional quests.
